CatDescriptText: Cutline for related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 9, 1960, pg. A18, reads: "Peter Pans Seen at Memorial - The Peter Pan Mother's Club recently held a Children's Fashion Show at the Stephen Foster Memorial Hall.  The purpose of this club is to promote the welfare of their children and family in the home, church and community through social and cultural activities.  Above are the Peter Pan Usherettes.  They are, from left to right: Leslie Cyrus, Toni Bray, Rita Miller, Marian Wiggins and Mary Lou Williams. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Leslie Cyrus, Antoinette Bray, Rita Miller, Marian Wiggins, and Mary Lou Williams wearing Peter Pan costumes for Peter Pan Mother's Club Children's Fashion Show at Stephen Foster Memorial Hall, Oakland
